rubygem.name: cucumber
rubygem.info: Behaviour Driven Development with elegance and joy

rubygem.name: culerity
rubygem.info: Culerity integrates Cucumber and Celerity in order to test your application's full stack.

rubygem.name: cucumber-rails
rubygem.info: Cucumber Generators and Runtime for Rails
rubygem.authors: Aslak Hellesøy, Dennis Blöte, Rob Holland

rubygem.name: ci_reporter
rubygem.info: CI::Reporter is an add-on to Test::Unit, RSpec and Cucumber that allows you to generate XML reports of your test, spec and/or feature runs. The resulting files can be read by a continuous integration system that understands Ant's JUnit report XML format, thus allowing your CI system to track test/spec successes and failures.

rubygem.name: email_spec
rubygem.info: Easily test email in rspec and cucumber
rubygem.authors: Ben Mabey, Aaron Gibralter, Mischa Fierer

rubygem.name: pickle
rubygem.info: Easy model creation and reference in your cucumber features

rubygem.name: autotest-growl
rubygem.info: This gem aims to improve support for Growl notifications by autotest.

rubygem.name: vcr
rubygem.info: VCR provides a simple API to record and replay your test suite's HTTP interactions. It works with a variety of HTTP client libraries, HTTP stubbing libraries and testing frameworks.

rubygem.name: aruba
rubygem.info: CLI Steps for Cucumber, hand-crafted for you in Aruba
rubygem.authors: Aslak Hellesøy, David Chelimsky, Mike Sassak

rubygem.name: specjour
rubygem.info: Specjour splits your RSpec suite across multiple machines, and multiple cores per machine, to run super-parallel-fast! Also works with Cucumber.

rubygem.name: stepdown
rubygem.info: Stepdown allows you to see where your most used Cucumber steps are, your unused steps and how they are clustered

rubygem.name: cuke4duke
rubygem.info: Write Cucumber Step Definitions in Java, Scala, Groovy, Rhino Javascript, Clojure or Ioke

rubygem.name: cucumber-nagios
rubygem.info: cucumber-nagios helps you write behavioural tests for your systems and infrastructure, that can be plugged into Nagios.

rubygem.name: cuporter
rubygem.info: Scrapes Cucumber *.feature files to build reports on tag usage and test inventory

rubygem.name: coulda
rubygem.info: Behaviour Driven Development derived from Cucumber but as an internal DSL with methods for reuse

rubygem.name: rspactor
rubygem.info: RSpactor is a command line tool to automatically run your changed specs & cucumber features (much like autotest).
rubygem.authors: Mislav Marohnić, Andreas Wolff, Pelle Braendgaard, Thibaud Guillaume-Gentil

rubygem.name: branston
rubygem.info: An agile user story tracker that generates gherkin files and step definitions for use with the cucumber testing framework.

rubygem.name: pickler
rubygem.info: Synchronize between Cucumber and Pivotal Tracker

rubygem.name: cucumber_factory
rubygem.info: Cucumber Factory allows you to create ActiveRecord models from your Cucumber features without writing step definitions for each model.

rubygem.name: testbot
rubygem.info: Testbot is a test distribution tool that works with Rails, RSpec, RSpec2, Test::Unit and Cucumber.

rubygem.name: iCuke
rubygem.info: Cucumber support for iPhone applications

rubygem.name: cucumber-in-the-yard
rubygem.info: Cucumber-In-The-Yard is a YARD extension that processes Cucumber Features, Scenarios, Steps, Step Definitions, Transforms, and Tags and provides a documentation interface that allows you easily view and investigate the test suite. This tools hopes to bridge the gap of being able to provide your feature descriptions to your Product Owners and Stakeholders.

rubygem.name: sandwich
rubygem.info: Yup, cucumber helpers

rubygem.name: shoe
rubygem.info: Configuration-free Rake tasks that read your gemspec. These tasks re-use built-in Rubygems functionality so you can be confident you're shipping what you think you are.

rubygem.name: guard-cucumber
rubygem.info: Guard::Cucumber automatically run your features (much like autotest)

rubygem.name: aruba-jbb
rubygem.info: Fork of Aruba, Cucumber steps for testing CLI applications.
rubygem.authors: Aslak Hellesøy, David Chelimsky, James B. Byrne, Mike Sassak

rubygem.name: fuubar-cucumber
rubygem.info: the instafailing Cucumber progress bar formatter

rubygem.name: cuke4nuke
rubygem.info: Runs Cucumber with .NET step definitions.

rubygem.name: cucumber-sinatra
rubygem.info: This little gem will help you to initialize a cucumber environment for a sinatra application. It will generate the required files from templates.

rubygem.name: cucumber-screenshot
rubygem.info: Extension for Cucumber (http://cukes.info/) that makes it easy to take HTML snapshots and also to use Webkit to capture PNG screenshots of your web application during tests
